DOC.brief_title: Third Stage Labor Swedish Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Management third stage labour focus investigation decade active management third stage labour ( AMTSL ) recommend woman give birth vaginally hospital . In Sweden recommendation give injection oxytocin immediately birth neonate entire AMTSL procedure . Women labour asked participate voluntarily enter hospital acceptance randomise either active expectant management third stage labour ( EMTSL ) . AMTSL include : - Early cord clamp - 10 UI oxytocin i.v - control cord traction - uterine massage placenta expulsion EMTSL include : - early cord clamp - 2 mL saline solution i.v - wait sign placenta detachment - encourage woman push placenta effort - uterine massage placenta expulsion All blood measure weigh bed pad sanitary towel two hour postpartum Assessment afterpains perform Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) Pain-o-meter ( POM-WDS ) two hour delivery placenta , day childbirth .
DOC.criteria: healthy woman normal pregnancy gestational age 34+0 43+0 week singleton , cephalic presentation expect vaginal birth non Swedishspeaking previous PPH > 1000 mL elective Caesarean section preeclampsia grand multiparity ( ≥5 ) intrauterine fetal death
